author: Topsy
description:
It's now December and winter is coming! Time to get cosy with a hot drink and reflect on the last few weeks. There was a lot going on over on Tale of Painters in November. Alongside reviews of Kill Team: Dead Silence, Chaos Marauders, and naturally Darkwater, we also had some brilliant miniature showcases. You can find all of that here in the recap.

The post Best of: Tale of Painters November 2025 appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Best of: Tale of Painters November 2025
